text: The NCC Open was a golf tournament on the Swedish Golf Tour from 1984 and on the Challenge Tour from 1990. It was last played in 2001 and always held at Söderåsen Golf Club near Söderåsen National Park outside Helsingborg, Sweden. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable !Year!!Winner!!Country || Score || Margin of victory || Runner(s)-up || Ref |- ! colspan=7|NCC Open |- | 2001 || Benn Barham || || −11 (71-67-63-72=273) || 2 strokes || Paul Dwyer || |- | 2000 || David Higgins || || −10 (69-70-64-71=274) || 3 strokes || Martin Erlandsson || |- | 1999 || Per G.
